title: Commonwealth Review. No. 15
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Fishing under the ice in Canadian lakes; The visit of the Malaysian Welfare Officers to a Government Rehabilitation Centre in Britain; a Nigerian organist at Cambridge University; a Trinidad textile designer in London; The training of the staff of Radio Uganda; Horse racing throughout the Commonwealth, showing the training of jockeys and their mounts.
